title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure of DroneBasedReforestation system, including hardware components and software modules.

title: Develop Flight Controller Software
description: Create software for the drone's flight control system to ensure precise seed placement.

title: Implement Seed Dispensing Mechanism
description: Design and develop the mechanical component to disperse seeds during flight.

title: Integrate Sensor Systems for Navigation and Terrain Mapping
description: Combine sensors to enable the drone to navigate difficult terrains and map affected areas.

title: Create Mobile Application for Operator Control
description: Develop an intuitive mobile application that allows operators to control drone operations.

title: Design User Interface for Web Dashboard
description: Create a user-friendly web dashboard to display data on reforestation progress, drone status, and environmental conditions.

title: Implement Seed Storage and Loading Module
description: Design a seed storage solution that ensures efficient loading of seeds onto the drone.

title: Develop Communication Protocol for Drone and Ground Station
description: Create a secure communication protocol between the drone and ground station to ensure reliable data transfer.

title: Perform Unit Testing for Major Components
description: Test individual components of the DroneBasedReforestation system to ensure they function correctly.
dependencies: Integrate Sensor Systems for Navigation and Terrain Mapping
Create Mobile Application for Operator Control
Design User Interface for Web Dashboard
Implement Seed Storage and Loading Module
Develop Communication Protocol for Drone and Ground Station

title: Revised Technical Documentation - READY FOR APPROVAL
description: Task revised to include comprehensive technical documentation for the system (assembly instructions, user guides, and maintenance manuals). The updated document is structured in a way that it is easily understandable for both technical and non-technical personnel. Clear language, conciseness, and organization have been emphasized. Diagrams or visual aids are incorporated where appropriate. Please review the documentation and provide any necessary feedback.
